column4: Hello everyone, I can't umount a NFS mount when the NFS hosts shutdown, I got device or resource is busy, and i can't use nautilus or ls any more, how to solve it?
if it's hard mounted, it won't unmount, but mount will resume when you restart the nfs server
yes, i can use it when the NFS server restart, but before it is restarted, i can't use nautilus any more.... and ls..
